This repository contains a collection of mini workshops that are designed to be 1-4 hours in length

Workshop sites can be found under the workshops menu and are available for:

- [Delving deeper into R](delvingdeeper.html)
- [More Tidyverse](moretidyverse.html)
- [Useful code snippets for everyday tasks](usefulcodesnippets.html)
